Demonstration of a MQTT client connecting via Websockets in the browser.

This script demonstrates a MOWS browser client connecting to a server over HTTP and HTTPS. It relies on the server script located at 'examples/server/server.js'.

The server uses a self-signed certifcate for localhost. In order for this client to work:

  1. Start the server (ie node examples/server/server.js)
  2. In your browser, visit https://localhost:666.
  3. Your browser will display a security warning. Accept / Approve or add a security exception depending on your browser.
  4. Reload this HTML file
